content: crochet star in drops kid-silk drops design pattern no ks-120 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- measurements approx 8 cm / 3 1/8 in diameter measured from tip to tip materials drops kid-silk from garnstudio 25 g color no 01 off white one star weighs approx 5 g drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm/e/4 or size needed to get 22 double_crochet = width 10 cm / 4
